messages.message: Hi team, with an Organization that has multiple Workspaces such as in the attached pic, which projects are supposed to be listed in the Projects section of the homepage? It looks like Deployments and Reviews are at the Organization level. Projects I assume is at the Workspace scope but is there a way to select a Workspace? I think it's displaying Projects in My Workspace but it's missing some.

Deployments and Reviews are also at the Workspace level. All of the assets you see here are the ones you've most recently opened; as you open more, these lists will become populated. If you want to see all assets you have access to, you can click "Workspaces" in the top bar.

When you say `Deployments and Reviews are also at the Workspace level`, where do you select which Workspace to view?

In my case, it's showing Deployments and Reviews not in My Workspace. Projects makes sense as the most recently opened.

It looks like you're viewing the homepage right now, which collates all the recent assets you've accessed across any workspaces you have access to - that may be in My Workspace, but it may also be in shared workspaces you have access to. So you wouldn't select which Workspace to view here - this is more of a quick way to access things you've been working on.

If you want to view your assets by workspace, you can go to the Workspaces tab from the top nav, which brings you to the main view for assets where you can actually see everything.
